entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:08 PM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:08 PM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023
